name.ja: <ruby>融<rt>ゆう</rt></ruby><ruby>合<rt>ごう</rt></ruby><ruby>強<rt>きょう</rt></ruby><ruby>兵<rt>へい</rt></ruby>

text.en: Reveal 1 Fusion Monster in your Extra Deck and Special Summon 1 of the Fusion Materials mentioned on it from your Extra Deck or GY, but until the end of your opponent's turn, it cannot attack, also its effects are negated. You can only activate 1 "Fusion Reinforcement" per turn.
